data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
data.author: Pele

data.quote: You have to be strong and calm to overcome difficult moments.
data.author: Dani Alves

data.quote: Life is about how much you can take and keep fighting, how much you can suffer and keep moving forward.
data.author: Anderson Silva

data.quote: No one can reap the fruit before planting the trees.
data.author: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva

data.quote: There's no right way to be a woman; there's only a right way to be a human, which is to have respect for others.
data.author: Anitta

data.quote: I always say, 'To have a big dream requires the same effort as having a small dream. Dream big!'
data.author: Jorge Paulo Lemann

data.quote: The secret of the wise man is to learn from the errors of others.
data.author: Alisson Ramses Becker

data.quote: The worst thing in life is not to die but to live with bitterness.
data.author: Vitor Belfort

data.quote: I am very careful about who I choose to build memories with. Some of them might last a lifetime.
data.author: Angélica Calheiros

data.quote: A war can perhaps be won single-handedly. But peace - lasting peace - cannot be secured without the support of all.
data.author: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva

data.quote: I have never made a friend from whom I could not separate, and I have never made an enemy that I could not approach.
data.author: Tancredo Neves

data.quote: I don't like to look behind. I like to look forward to what I can do, what I can win.
data.author: Lucas Moura

data.quote: I'm already used to being a target, so I'm building a castle with the stones people throw at me.
data.author: Cris Cygborg

data.quote: The really magical things are the ones that happen right in front of you. A lot of the time you keep looking for beauty, but it is already there. And if you look with a bit more intention, you see it.
data.author: Vik Muniz

data.quote: The faster you go, the idler you get.
data.author: Ferreira Gullar

data.quote: What I say is the only thing I can control.
data.author: Morena Baccarin

data.quote: Humanity needs dreams to be able to survive the miseries of daily existence, even if only for an instant.
data.author: Oscar Niemeyer

data.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
data.author: Oscar Wilde
